name: Fate of The Mallow
description:
Fate of The Mallow

Embark on a journey to discover what happened to the gentle Mallow. Play through til the end to discover the true secrets of their mysterious disappearance.

Platform your way through increasingly difficult obstacles while racing to stay ahead of the unstoppable inferno at your back.

The game may seem difficult at first, maybe even impossible, but with determination the full story can be revealed.

For those of you struggling to complete the level I have included a full gameplay video of a run that I did. Hopefully that will help you out a bit in knowing what is ahead of you. The game is intentionally difficult so the end feels like more of a reward; apologies for any frustration you may receive from this :)


Created for Juice Jam II

Thanks for taking the time to play our little game!

Note: Web GL version loses some visuals due to not supporting compute shaders. For full effect please consider downloading the windows version
